title: User Authentication Success
description: Verify that a user can successfully authenticate with valid credentials and that the session is securely managed.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid username and password
Click the login button
User is logged in successfully and redirected to the dashboard
Verify the session cookie is set with secure attributes

title: User Authentication Failure
description: Verify that authentication fails with invalid credentials and an appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid username and/or password
Click the login button
Login fails and an error message is displayed
No session cookie is set

title: Role-based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that users can only access pages and APIs allowed by their assigned roles and permissions.

steps.description: Login with a user assigned a limited set of permissions
Attempt to access restricted UI components and API endpoints
Access to restricted features is denied
User interface does not show unauthorized elements

title: Employee CRUD Operations
description: Verify creation, retrieval, update, and deletion of employee records including validation of mandatory fields.

steps.description: Navigate to Employee Management module
Create a new employee with valid details
Employee record is saved and visible in the employee list
Edit the employee's profile information
Changes are saved and reflected accurately
Delete the employee record
Employee record is removed from the system

title: Employee Document Upload Validation
description: Verify uploading employee documents validates file types, size limits, supports versioning, and approval workflows.

steps.description: Navigate to an employee profile documents section
Upload valid document file within size limits
Document is uploaded successfully and versioned
Upload unsupported file type
Upload is rejected with appropriate error
Submit document for approval
Approval workflow is triggered and document status updated accordingly

title: Project Creation and Resource Allocation
description: Validate creation of a project with associated resources and verify task and milestone management.

steps.description: Open Project Management module
Create a new project with required details
Project appears in the projects list
Allocate resources (employees, equipment) to the project
Resources are linked to the project and visible
Add tasks and milestones to the project
Tasks and milestones appear under the project with correct details

title: Equipment Inventory Lifecycle
description: Test equipment adding, maintenance scheduling, QR code generation, and rental status tracking.

steps.description: Navigate to Equipment Management
Add new equipment with valid details
Equipment details are saved and listed
Generate QR code for the equipment
QR code is generated and scannable
Schedule maintenance for the equipment
Maintenance schedule is saved and retrievable
Update rental status to checked out and then checked in
Rental status updates are reflected correctly

title: Rental Agreement Lifecycle and Billing
description: Verify creation, modification, invoicing, and payment tracking of rental agreements with ERPNext synchronization.

steps.description: Create a new rental agreement with equipment and customer linkage
Rental agreement is saved and visible
Generate invoice for the rental agreement
Invoice is generated with correct billing details
Record payment against the invoice
Payment status is updated correctly
Trigger synchronization with ERPNext
Rental data and invoices are synchronized without errors

title: Customer Profile and Credit Limit Management
description: Verify creation and update of customer profiles with credit limits and associated projects, and ERPNext financial data integration.

steps.description: Add a new customer profile with credit limit and projects assigned
Customer is added and visible in the customer list
Update customer's credit limit
Credit limit updates are saved correctly
Trigger ERPNext synchronization for customer financial data
Financial data is synced and statuses reported accurately

title: Timesheet Entry and Approval Workflow
description: Validate timesheet entry by field workers, approval by managers, bulk operations, and payroll integration.

steps.description: Field worker creates timesheet entries for tasks performed
Timesheet entries are saved and time tracked accurately
Submit timesheets for approval
Timesheets enter approval workflow
Manager approves or rejects timesheets
Timesheet statuses are updated accordingly
Verify timesheet data integration with payroll
Payroll reflects approved timesheet hours correctly

title: Payroll Salary Calculation and Payslip Generation
description: Verify automated salary calculations including advances, increments, and generation of payslip PDFs for employees.

steps.description: Input employee salary and advances for payroll processing
Trigger payroll calculation
Salaries are calculated correctly including deductions and advances
Generate payslip for an employee
Payslip PDF is generated with accurate salary details
Apply salary increment and validate recalculation
Payroll reflects updated salary

title: Leave Request and Approval
description: Verify the leave request process including submission, approval workflow, leave calendar integration, and policy enforcement.

steps.description: Employee submits a leave request with valid leave type
Leave request is saved and appears in pending status
Manager reviews and approves the leave request
Leave request status updates to approved
Verify leave is reflected on the shared leave calendar
Leave days are properly deducted based on policy

title: Quotation Generation and Conversion to Rental
description: Validate the process to create quotations, route them through approval workflows, track versions, and convert approved quotes to rentals.

steps.description: Create a new quotation with customer and equipment details
Quotation is saved and versioned
Send quotation for approval
Approval workflow is triggered and status updated
Convert approved quotation to rental agreement
Rental agreement is created with data from the quotation

title: Document Management with Version Control and Approval
description: Verify document upload, application of version control, approval statuses, and secure storage access.

steps.description: Upload a document to the company document repository
Document is uploaded successfully and versioned
Submit the document for approval
Document approval workflow is initiated and tracked
Attempt to access the document file from S3-compatible storage URL
Document can be downloaded securely and access is permission controlled

title: Real-time Notifications Delivery
description: Verify that real-time notifications via Server-Sent Events (SSE) are delivered to users without latency or loss.

steps.description: Trigger a system event generating a notification
Notification is received by the subscribed user in real-time
Open the notification bell UI component
Notification appears correctly with relevant details and status

title: Internationalization and RTL Layout
description: Validate language switching between Arabic and English, confirming correct text translation and RTL layout for Arabic.

steps.description: Load the UI in English language
All UI elements display text in English
Switch the language to Arabic
UI text is translated to Arabic
The layout changes to RTL orientation consistently across all pages

title: Automated Monthly Billing and Invoice Generation
description: Verify that automated monthly billing runs generate accurate invoices which sync correctly with ERPNext financial records.

steps.description: Trigger automated monthly billing job
Invoices are generated for all due rentals with correct amounts
Manually trigger synchronization with ERPNext
Billing invoices are correctly synced to ERPNext with no errors

title: SQL Injection and Input Validation Security
description: Test user inputs across the system for proper validation to prevent SQL injection and other injection attacks.

steps.description: Attempt to enter SQL injection payloads into input fields across modules
Inputs are sanitized and no database errors or unauthorized data leakage occurs
Verify API input validation rejects malicious payloads
API responses contain appropriate error messages without sensitive information

title: Performance Testing for Page Load and API Response
description: Measure and validate that all key pages load within 3 seconds and API responses return within 500ms under normal load conditions.

steps.description: Load key UI pages (Dashboard, Employee Management, Rental Management) multiple times
Page load times are consistently under 3 seconds
Send API requests to key endpoints including authentication, employee CRUD, rental invoicing
API response times are consistently under 500ms

title: Data Synchronization Accuracy with ERPNext
description: Validate that customer, employee, invoice, and payment data synchronize accurately and completely with ERPNext without data loss or corruption.

steps.description: Modify customer and employee data in SND system
Trigger synchronization with ERPNext
Data changes are reflected correctly in ERPNext
Generate rental invoices and payments
Trigger synchronization for financial data
Invoices and payments reflect accurately on ERPNext with matching data

title: Leave Policy Enforcement Edge Cases
description: Test leave requests that exceed leave balances, overlap with holidays, or fall outside allowed types.

steps.description: Submit leave request exceeding available leave balance
Request is rejected with appropriate message
Submit leave request overlapping defined holiday dates
System flags or handles overlap as per configured policy
Attempt to submit leave with an unsupported leave type
Submission is rejected with validation error

title: Rental Equipment Check-in/Check-out Validation
description: Verify equipment status updates during check-out and check-in, ensuring rental history and maintenance schedules are updated accordingly.

steps.description: Check out equipment to a rental agreement
Equipment status changes to rented and rental history logs check-out time
Check in equipment after rental period
Equipment status changes to available and check-in time recorded
Verify maintenance due flags update if needed post check-in
Maintenance scheduling reflects new status accurately

title: Final Settlement Calculation and PDF Generation
description: Test final settlement computations for departing employees and generation of settlement PDF documents.

steps.description: Input employee data for final settlement calculation
Trigger final settlement calculation
Settlement amount is calculated correctly
Generate final settlement PDF
PDF contains accurate settlement details formatted correctly

title: Safety Incident Reporting and Compliance Tracking
description: Validate reporting of safety incidents, severity classification, investigation tracking, and compliance updates.

steps.description: Report a new safety incident with required details
Incident is logged and visible in safety management dashboard
Classify incident severity and assign investigation tasks
Severity level and investigation status are updated correctly
Generate H2S training cards based on completed safety training
Cards are generated as PDFs with correct employee info

title: Multi-device UI Accessibility and Responsiveness
description: Verify that the bilingual user interface renders correctly and is responsive across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

steps.description: Access the system via desktop browser in English
UI displays correctly and all features function properly
Access the system using a tablet device browser in Arabic
UI respects RTL layout and remains fully usable
Access the system via mobile device browser
UI layout adapts fluidly with no content overlap or hidden elements
